group_1.textRight: Do you have your wallet?

group_1.textLeft: For sure this time!@I won't make that mistake again!
It's nice and reassuring to have you tag along@with me, but…
All I gotta do today is pick up my resignation@papers.

group_1.textRight: You almost forgot to bring farewell snacks@with you to the studio, though.

group_1.textLeft: Urgh… That's true…

group_1.textRight: If this truly is the last time you're going to@stop by, you need to get your act together.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… I really gotta keep it steady…
I can't do this alone at all…

group_1.textRight: Did something happen on the day of your@diabolo class?

group_1.textLeft: Eh…?

group_1.textRight: To me, it seems like you've been a little@down since then.
I thought you might have been feeling bad@about not being a good enough coach.
Is there another reason…?

group_1.textLeft: A-absolutely nothin', see!@You got it all wrong!

group_1.textRight: If that's the case, then fine.@But I want to tell you this.
You're one of my dearest friends.@I'm not going to force you to open up, but…
If talking about it would make you feel better,@I'd like you to do so.

group_1.textLeft: I knew I couldn't hide anything from you, Rabi…
…Back in the diabolo class,
I kept thinkin', "Kurara was a better teacher@than me"…

group_1.textRight: The girl you were partnered with…

group_1.textLeft: Uh-huh… It made me remember her, see,@and how much I miss her…

group_1.textRight: Urara and Kurara's street performance duo@is getting together today!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks for workin' with me!
The two of us are gonna be the best duo@in the whole wide world.
We'll make people all over the globe smile@with our diabolo act!

group_1.textRight: Let's give it our all, okay, Urara?

group_1.textLeft: But we're not together anymore.
I was hopin' we could at least clear up the misunderstanding and make up…

group_1.textRight: …She's the leader of Yukuni's Magical Girl@eradication faction now.
I doubt she'll listen to you now that you're@one of "them"…

group_1.textLeft: We were both in shock after the accident,@and neither of us was bein' rational.
But we've been workin' together for ages,@and we were best friends,
so maybe she'll cool down and listen to me now.

group_1.textRight: …I don't believe there's the slightest chance@of that happening.
I think you should give up on trying to get@back together.

group_1.textLeft: (But I…wanna be able to talk to Kurara again…)
We're here!

group_1.textRight: I'll be waiting for you.@Call me when you're done.

group_1.textLeft: Will do.

group_1.textRight: Oh, Manager?@What's goin' on?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, you'll have to wait here.@I'm in the middle of somethin'…

group_1.textCenter: Why is SHE here?!@Didn't she quit?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:103601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*
(That's Kurara's voice!)

group_1.textLeft: I was trying to coordinate things so ya wouldn't@bump into each other.
Kurara suddenly dropped by the agency@after recordin', though…

group_1.textRight: (This chance to talk to her in person…@There's no way I'm lettin' it pass me by.)
…Urara, what are you thinking?

group_1.textLeft: Rabi…I've made up my mind.

group_1.textRight: …I'm not going to say anything bad about her.@However, I think you should cut contact.

group_1.textLeft: But see, I can't give up…!

group_1.textRight: …Manager!

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: I wanna talk to Kurara directly for a bit…!
